entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low plus 4.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming south 20 near midnight. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High 13 except 8 along parts of the coast. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 60 percent chance of showers in the afternoon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h near noon. High 13 except 8 along parts of the coast. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Showers. Low plus 3.
entry.summary: Showers. Fog patches developing in the evening and dissipating overnight. Amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h after midnight. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Tuesday 18 April 2023
